nodes.bodyText:
Third time we do the same code, WDYT about adding a method to ClusterService or a helper to retrieve the duration from a given Framework property name?
On 10.10 and 9.10, it could be on the ClusterLockHelper.
How about I put it in DurationUtils instead?
I pushed 2 more commits for this
Is there an interest for static?
